Action.Name: Task
Action.Sql: select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, -1 AS `iRoleJob`, -1 AS `iRoleGender`, -1 AS `iRoleLevel`, -1 AS `iRoleVipLevel`, ConvertNull(`iTaskType`) AS `iTaskType`, ConvertNull(`iTaskId`) AS `iTaskId`, ConvertNull(`iTaskStar`) AS `iTaskLevel`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iAcceptRoleNum`, COUNT(*) AS `iAcceptTimes`, COUNT(DISTINCT `vUin`) AS `iAcceptUinNum` FROM `TaskStart` GROUP BY `iWorldId`,`iTaskType`,`iTaskId`,`iTaskStar` WITH CUBE

select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, -1 AS `iRoleJob`, -1 AS `iRoleGender`, -1 AS `iRoleLevel`, -1 AS `iRoleVipLevel`, ConvertNull(`iTaskType`) AS `iTaskType`, ConvertNull(`iTaskId`) AS `iTaskId`, ConvertNull(`iTaskStar`) AS `iTaskLevel`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iCompleteRoleNum`, COUNT(*) AS `iCompleteTimes`, COUNT(DISTINCT `vUin`) AS `iCompleteUinNum`, SUM(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`dtEventTime`) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`dtTaskStartTime`)) AS `iTotalTime` FROM `TaskFinished` GROUP BY `iWorldId`,`iTaskType`,`iTaskId`,`iTaskStar` WITH CUBE
Action.Final: SELECT '2015-06-18', IF(T1.iAccountType IS NULL,T2.iAccountType,T1.iAccountType), IF(T1.iWorldId IS NULL,T2.iWorldId,T1.iWorldId), IF(T1.iRoleJob IS NULL,T2.iRoleJob,T1.iRoleJob), IF(T1.iRoleGender IS NULL,T2.iRoleGender,T1.iRoleGender), IF(T1.iRoleLevel IS NULL,T2.iRoleLevel,T1.iRoleLevel), IF(T1.iRoleVipLevel IS NULL,T2.iRoleVipLevel,T1.iRoleVipLevel), IF(T1.iTaskType IS NULL, T2.iTaskType, T1.iTaskType), IF(T1.iTaskId IS NULL, T2.iTaskId, T1.iTaskId), IF(T1.iTaskLevel IS NULL, T2.iTaskLevel, T1.iTaskLevel), IF(T1.iAcceptRoleNum IS NULL, '0' ,T1.iAcceptRoleNum), IF(T1.iAcceptTimes IS NULL, '0', T1.iAcceptTimes), IF(T2.iCompleteRoleNum IS NULL, '0', T2.iCompleteRoleNum), IF(T2.iCompleteTimes IS NULL, '0', T2.iCompleteTimes), 0, 0, IF(T1.iAcceptUinNum IS NULL, '0', T1.iAcceptUinNum), IF(T2.iCompleteUinNum IS NULL, '0', T2.iCompleteUinNum), IF(T2.iTotalTime IS NULL, '0', T2.iTotalTime) FROM T1 FULL JOIN T2 ON (T1.iAccountType=T2.iAccountType AND T1.iWorldId=T2.iWorldId AND T1.iRoleJob=T2.iRoleJob AND T1.iRoleGender=T2.iRoleGender AND T1.iRoleLevel=T2.iRoleLevel AND T1.iRoleVipLevel=T2.iRoleVipLevel AND T1.iTaskType=T2.iTaskType AND T1.iTaskId=T2.iTaskId AND T1.iTaskLevel=T2.iTaskLevel)

Action.Name: Copy
Action.Sql: select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, -1 AS `iRoleJob`, -1 AS `iRoleGender`, -1 AS `iRoleLevel`, -1 AS `iRoleVipLevel`, ConvertNull(`iCopyType`) AS `iCopyTypeId`, ConvertNull(`iCopyId`) AS `iCopyId`, ConvertNull(`iCopyLevel`) AS `iCopyLevel`, -1 AS `iAchievementId`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iStartRoleNum`, COUNT(*) AS `iStartTimes`, COUNT(DISTINCT `vUin`) AS `iStartUinNum` FROM `CopyEnter` GROUP BY `iWorldId`,`iCopyType`,`iCopyId`,`iCopyLevel` WITH CUBE

select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, -1 AS `iRoleJob`, -1 AS `iRoleGender`, -1 AS `iRoleLevel`, -1 AS `iRoleVipLevel`, ConvertNull(`iCopyType`) AS `iCopyTypeId`, ConvertNull(`iCopyId`) AS `iCopyId`, ConvertNull(`iCopyLevel`) AS `iCopyLevel`, ConvertNull(`iCopystar`) AS `iAchievementId`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iCompleteRoleNum`, COUNT(*) AS `iCompleteTimes`, COUNT(DISTINCT `vUin`) AS `iCompleteUinNum`, SUM(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`dtEventTime`) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`dtEventTime`)) AS `iTotalTime` FROM `CopyExit` WHERE `iExitType` = 0 GROUP BY `iWorldId`,`iCopyType`,`iCopyId`,`iCopyLevel`,`iCopystar` WITH CUBE

select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, -1 AS `iRoleJob`, -1 AS `iRoleGender`, -1 AS `iRoleLevel`, -1 AS `iRoleVipLevel`, ConvertNull(`iCopyType`) AS `iCopyTypeId`, ConvertNull(`iCopyId`) AS `iCopyId`, ConvertNull(`iCopyLevel`) AS `iCopyLevel`, -1 AS `iAchievementId`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iCancelRoleNum`, COUNT(*) AS `iCancelTimes`, COUNT(DISTINCT `vUin`) AS `iCancelUinNum`, SUM(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`dtEventTime`) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`dtEventTime`)) AS `iCancelTotalTime` FROM `CopyExit` WHERE `iExitType` != 0 GROUP BY `iWorldId`,`iCopyType`,`iCopyId`,`iCopyLevel` WITH CUBE

SELECT IF(T1.`iAccountType` IS NULL,T2.`iAccountType`,T1.`iAccountType`) AS `iAccountType`, IF(T1.`iWorldId` IS NULL,T2.`iWorldId`,T1.`iWorldId`) `iWorldId`, IF(T1.`iRoleJob` IS NULL,T2.`iRoleJob`,T1.`iRoleJob`) `iRoleJob`, IF(T1.`iRoleGender` IS NULL,T2.`iRoleGender`,T1.`iRoleGender`) `iRoleGender`, IF(T1.`iRoleLevel` IS NULL,T2.`iRoleLevel`,T1.`iRoleLevel`) `iRoleLevel`, IF(T1.`iRoleVipLevel` IS NULL,T2.`iRoleVipLevel`,T1.`iRoleVipLevel`) `iRoleVipLevel`, IF(T1.`iCopyTypeId` IS NULL, T2.`iCopyTypeId`, T1.`iCopyTypeId`) `iCopyTypeId`, IF(T1.`iCopyId` IS NULL, T2.`iCopyId`,T1.`iCopyId`) `iCopyId`, IF(T1.`iCopyLevel` IS NULL, T2.`iCopyLevel`, T1.`iCopyLevel`) `iCopyLevel`, IF(T1.`iAchievementId` IS NULL, T2.`iAchievementId`, T1.`iAchievementId`) `iAchievementId`, IF(T1.`iStartRoleNum` IS NULL, '0' ,T1.`iStartRoleNum`) `iStartRoleNum`, IF(T1.`iStartTimes` IS NULL, '0', T1.`iStartTimes`) `iStartTimes`, IF(T2.`iCompleteRoleNum` IS NULL, '0', T2.`iCompleteRoleNum`) `iCompleteRoleNum`, IF(T2.`iCompleteTimes` IS NULL, '0', T2.`iCompleteTimes`) `iCompleteTimes`, IF(T1.`iStartUinNum` IS NULL, '0', T1.`iStartUinNum`) `iStartUinNum`, IF(T2.`iCompleteUinNum` IS NULL, '0', T2.`iCompleteUinNum`) `iCompleteUinNum`, IF(T2.`iTotalTime` IS NULL, '0', T2.`iTotalTime`) `iTotalTime` FROM T1 FULL JOIN T2 ON (T1.`iAccountType`=T2.`iAccountType` AND T1.`iWorldId`=T2.`iWorldId` AND T1.`iRoleJob`=T2.`iRoleJob` AND T1.`iRoleGender`=T2.`iRoleGender` AND T1.`iRoleLevel`=T2.`iRoleLevel` AND T1.`iRoleVipLevel`=T2.`iRoleVipLevel` AND T1.`iCopyTypeId`=T2.`iCopyTypeId` AND T1.`iCopyId`=T2.`iCopyId` AND T1.`iCopyLevel`=T2.`iCopyLevel` AND T1.`iAchievementId`=T2.`iAchievementId`)
Action.Final: SELECT '2015-06-18', IF(T4.`iAccountType` IS NULL,T3.`iAccountType`,T4.`iAccountType`) `iAccountType`, IF(T4.iWorldId IS NULL,T3.iWorldId,T4.iWorldId) iWorldId, IF(T4.iRoleJob IS NULL,T3.iRoleJob,T4.iRoleJob) iRoleJob, IF(T4.iRoleGender IS NULL,T3.iRoleGender,T4.iRoleGender) iRoleGender, IF(T4.iRoleLevel IS NULL,T3.iRoleLevel,T4.iRoleLevel) iRoleLevel, IF(T4.iRoleVipLevel IS NULL,T3.iRoleVipLevel,T4.iRoleVipLevel) iRoleVipLevel, IF(T4.iCopyTypeId IS NULL, T3.iCopyTypeId, T4.iCopyTypeId) iCopyTypeId, IF(T4.iCopyId IS NULL, T3.iCopyId,T4.iCopyId) iCopyId, IF(T4.iCopyLevel IS NULL, T3.iCopyLevel, T4.iCopyLevel) iCopyLevel, IF(T4.iAchievementId IS NULL, T3.iAchievementId, T4.iAchievementId) iAchievementId, IF(T4.iStartRoleNum IS NULL, '0' ,T4.iStartRoleNum) iStartRoleNum, IF(T4.iStartTimes IS NULL, '0', T4.iStartTimes) iStartTimes, IF(T4.iCompleteRoleNum IS NULL, '0', T4.iCompleteRoleNum) iCompleteRoleNum, IF(T4.iCompleteTimes IS NULL, '0', T4.iCompleteTimes) iCompleteTimes, IF(T3.iCancelRoleNum IS NULL, '0', T3.iCancelRoleNum) iCancelRoleNum, IF(T3.iCancelTimes IS NULL, '0', T3.iCancelTimes) iCancelTimes, IF(T4.iStartUinNum IS NULL, '0', T4.iStartUinNum), IF(T4.iCompleteUinNum IS NULL, '0', T4.iCompleteUinNum), IF(T3.iCancelUinNum IS NULL, '0', T3.iCancelUinNum), IF(T4.iTotalTime IS NULL, '0', T4.iTotalTime) iTotalTime, IF(T3.iCancelTotalTime IS NULL, '0', T3.iCancelTotalTime) iCancelTotalTime FROM T4 FULL JOIN T3 ON (T4.`iAccountType`=T3.`iAccountType` AND T4.iWorldId=T3.iWorldId AND T4.iRoleJob=T3.iRoleJob AND T4.iRoleGender=T3.iRoleGender AND T4.iRoleLevel=T3.iRoleLevel AND T4.iRoleVipLevel=T3.iRoleVipLevel AND T4.iCopyTypeId=T3.iCopyTypeId AND T4.iCopyId=T3.iCopyId AND T4.iCopyLevel=T3.iCopyLevel AND T4.iAchievementId=T3.iAchievementId)

Action.Name: Money
Action.Sql: select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, -1 AS `iRoleJob`, -1 AS `iRoleGender`, -1 AS `iRoleLevel`, -1 AS `iRoleVipLevel`, ConvertNull(`iMoneyType`) AS `iMoneyType`, ConvertNull(`iAction`) AS `iAction`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iRoleNum`, SUM(iMoney) AS iMoney, COUNT(*) AS `iTimes` FROM `MoneyFlow` WHERE iFlowType = 1 GROUP BY `iWorldId`,`iMoneyType`,`iAction` GROUPING SETS((`iWorldId`,`iMoneyType`,`iAction`), (`iWorldId`,`iMoneyType`),(`iMoneyType`,`iAction`),(`iMoneyType`))

select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, -1 AS `iRoleJob`, -1 AS `iRoleGender`, -1 AS `iRoleLevel`, -1 AS `iRoleVipLevel`, ConvertNull(`iMoneyType`) AS `iMoneyType`, ConvertNull(`iAction`) AS `iAction`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iRoleNum`, SUM(iMoney) AS iMoney, COUNT(*) AS `iTimes` FROM `MoneyFlow` WHERE iFlowType = 2 GROUP BY `iWorldId`,`iMoneyType`,`iAction` GROUPING SETS((`iWorldId`,`iMoneyType`,`iAction`), (`iWorldId`,`iMoneyType`),(`iMoneyType`,`iAction`),(`iMoneyType`))

select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, -1 AS `iRoleJob`, -1 AS `iRoleGender`, -1 AS `iRoleLevel`, -1 AS `iRoleVipLevel`, 1 AS `iMoneyType`, -1 AS `iAction`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iRoleNum`, SUM(iMoney) AS iMoney FROM `RoleStatus` WHERE iMoney > 0 GROUP BY `iWorldId` WITH CUBE

select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, -1 AS `iRoleJob`, -1 AS `iRoleGender`, -1 AS `iRoleLevel`, -1 AS `iRoleVipLevel`, 2 AS `iMoneyType`, -1 AS `iAction`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iRoleNum`, SUM(iPoints) AS iMoney FROM `RoleStatus` WHERE iPoints > 0 GROUP BY `iWorldId` WITH CUBE
Action.Final: SELECT '2015-06-18', iAccountType, iWorldId, iRoleJob, iRoleGender, iRoleLevel, iRoleVipLevel, iMoneyType, iAction, iRoleNum, iMoney, iTimes FROM T1
SELECT '2015-06-18', iAccountType, iWorldId, iRoleJob, iRoleGender, iRoleLevel, iRoleVipLevel, iMoneyType, iAction, iRoleNum, iMoney, iTimes FROM T2
SELECT '2015-06-18', iAccountType, iWorldId, iRoleJob, iRoleGender, iRoleLevel, iRoleVipLevel, iMoneyType, iAction, iRoleNum, iMoney FROM T3
SELECT '2015-06-18', iAccountType, iWorldId, iRoleJob, iRoleGender, iRoleLevel, iRoleVipLevel, iMoneyType, iAction, iRoleNum, iMoney FROM T4

Action.Name: RoleJobLvDis
Action.Sql: select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, ConvertNull(`iRoleJob`) AS `iRoleJob`, ConvertNull(`iRoleGender`) AS `iRoleGender`, ConvertNull(`iRoleLevel`) AS `iRoleLevel`, ConvertNull(`iRoleVipLevel`) AS `iRoleVipLevel`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iRoleNum` FROM `RoleStatus` GROUP BY `iWorldId`,`iRoleJob`,`iRoleGender`, `iRoleLevel`,`iRoleVipLevel` WITH CUBE

select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, ConvertNull(`iRoleJob`) AS `iRoleJob`, ConvertNull(`iRoleGender`) AS `iRoleGender`, ConvertNull(`iRoleLevel`) AS `iRoleLevel`, ConvertNull(`iRoleVipLevel`) AS `iRoleVipLevel`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iRoleNum` FROM `RoleStatus` WHERE `dtRoleLastSaveTime` >= '2015-06-18' AND `dtRoleLastSaveTime` < '2015-06-19' GROUP BY `iWorldId`,`iRoleJob`,`iRoleGender`, `iRoleLevel`,`iRoleVipLevel` WITH CUBE
Action.Final: SELECT '2015-06-18', iAccountType, iWorldId, iRoleJob, iRoleGender, iRoleLevel, iRoleVipLevel, iRoleNum FROM T1
SELECT '2015-06-18', iAccountType, iWorldId, iRoleJob, iRoleGender, iRoleLevel, iRoleVipLevel, iRoleNum FROM T2

Action.Name: GoodsVendition
Action.Sql: select -1 AS `iAccountType`, ConvertNull(`iWorldId`) AS `iWorldId`, -1 AS `iRoleJob`, -1 AS `iRoleGender`, -1 AS `iRoleLevel`, -1 AS `iRoleVipLevel`, ConvertNull(`iGoodsId`) AS `iGoodsId`, ConvertNull(`iGoodsType`) AS `iGoodsType`, ConvertNull(`iCostWay`) AS `iMoneyType`, SUM(`iGoodsNum`) AS `iGoodsNum`, SUM(`iCost`) AS `iPayment`, COUNT(DISTINCT `vUin`) AS `iPayUinNum`, COUNT(DISTINCT `iRoleId`) AS `iPayRoleNum` FROM `Shop` GROUP BY `iWorldId`,`iGoodsId`,`iGoodsType`,`iCostWay` GROUPING SETS((`iWorldId`,`iGoodsId`,`iGoodsType`,`iCostWay`), (`iGoodsId`,`iGoodsType`,`iCostWay`),(`iWorldId`,`iGoodsType`,`iCostWay`),(`iWorldId`,`iGoodsId`,`iCostWay`), (`iWorldId`,`iCostWay`),(`iGoodsId`,`iCostWay`),(`iGoodsType`,`iCostWay`), (`iCostWay`))
Action.Final: SELECT '2015-06-18', iAccountType, iWorldId, iRoleJob, iRoleGender, iRoleLevel, iRoleVipLevel, iGoodsId, iGoodsType, iMoneyType, iGoodsNum, iPayment, iPayUinNum, iPayRoleNum FROM T1
